title: Drawing, "Design for a Tureen and a Platter", 1740–48
medium: Graphite, pen and brush with ink wash and sepia
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Bird's-eye view. Birds shown in center of edge, left; fish depicted at right.

exhibitions.title: The Huguenot Legacy: English Silver, 1680-1760 from the Alan & Simone Hartman Collection
